review_blob: Can't say a single bad thing about this beer.... Amazing and spectacular - the sweet and bitter notes of vanilla, chocolate, and coffee blend perfectly well with the sweet, thick stout base.... Having had Founder's Breakfast Stout, I can say that there is a considerable difference... The hype is very well earned!
This is the real deal... Excellente! Taste, aroma, mouthfeel - all fantastic... Wish I tasted more of the Ancho chilies, but won't let that detract from an otherwise spectacular beer....
